column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This was my first time here and overall this place succeeds with tapas. I was part of a large group for a friend's birthday and we ordered a ton of food. Some plates that I enjoyed included: grilled skewer of marinated pork belly and pork loin
column3: grilled hangar steak with mojo picon
column5: goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column6: roasted dates with bacon and apple vinaigrette
column8: catalan bread with ripe tomato and the chef's artisanal cheese selection. I was quite full after sampling everything mentioned above. The white peach sangria washed everything down quite nicely.
